Repack Features

  • Based on Borderlands.3.Directors.Cut-CODEX release: codex-borderlands.3.directors.cut.iso (144,399,335,424 bytes)
  • All 22 DLCs are included and activated; Game build: 6500770
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (ONLY when installed with all voiceover packs and BTS videos!)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of “Behind the Scenes” videos & voiceover packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 134.5 to 55.5~90.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (one language): ~40 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~1 hour 10 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 135.7 GB
  • To change the game language, open properties for game desktop icon and edit the “-culture=ZZ” command line parameter. ZZ should be one of the following: en, fr, it, de, es, ru, ja, pt-BR, ko, zh-Hans-CN, zh-Hant-TW
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

MAYHEM IS COMING
The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and a mayhem-fueled adventure! Blast through new worlds and enemies as one of four new Vault Hunters. Play solo or with friends to take on insane enemies, score loads of loot and save your home from the most ruthless cult leaders in the galaxy.

A MAYHEM-FUELED THRILL RIDE
Stop the fanatical Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxy’s ultimate power.

YOUR VAULT HUNTER, YOUR PLAYSTYLE
Become one of 4 new Vault Hunters, each with deep skill trees, abilities and customization.

LOCK, LOAD, AND LOOT
With bazillions of guns and gadgets, every fight is an opportunity to score new gear.

NEW BORDERLANDS
Discover new worlds beyond Pandora, each with unique environments and enemies.

QUICK & SEAMLESS CO-OP ACTION
Play with anyone at any time with LAN co-op, regardless of your level or mission progress.

You can skip downloading of “Behind the Scenes” videos and voiceover files or you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin, fg-selective-english-2.bin, fg-selective-english-3.bin (REQUIRED for English, Russian and Brazilian users)
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin, fg-selective-chinese-2.bin, fg-selective-chinese-3.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin, fg-selective-french-2.bin, fg-selective-french-3.bin

  • fg-selective-korean.bin, fg-selective-korean-2.bin, fg-selective-korean-3.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-selective-spanish-2.bin, fg-selective-spanish-3.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin, fg-selective-spanish-2.bin, fg-selective-spanish-3.bin & all main files (01-11).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS EXTREMELY backwards compatible with my previous Borderlands 3 (Designer’s Cut) repack. The only changed files are setup.exe, fg-06.bin and fg-09.bin. Also fg-11.bin and new language bins have been added. So you can rehash old torrent with a new one and save up to 81.2 GB of traffic.
